patthana21.16:1.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:2.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:2.1_1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:3.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:3.1_1: Nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:4.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:6.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:8.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:10.1_0: Nasavitakkaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savitakko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.16:12.1_0: Nasavicāraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.16:14.1_0: Nasappītikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sappītiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.16:16.1_0: Napītisahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:18.1_0: Nasukhasahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sukhasahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:20.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā upekkhāsahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:22.1_0: Nanakāmāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nakāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:22.1_1: Nanakāmāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:24.1_0: Narūpāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā rūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:24.1_1: Narūpāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā narūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:26.1_0: Naarūpāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā arūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:26.1_1: Naarūpāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naarūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:28.1_0: Naapariyāpannaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā apariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:28.1_1: Naapariyāpannaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā pariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:30.1_0: Naniyyānikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā niyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:30.1_1: Naniyyānikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaniyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:32.1_0: Naniyataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā niyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:32.1_1: Naniyataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā aniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:34.1_0: Naanuttaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:34.1_1: Naanuttaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sauttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:36.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā araṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:37.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:38.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.16:38.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
